entry.title: Inflatables and Floats Bestway Crocodile Rider Float, Age 3+
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wholesale Resort Accessories
Type: Beach and Pool Accessories
Price: 6.00

 Bestway Crocodile Rider Float, Age 3+

Imagine you are in swamps of the Everglades, the Bestway Crocodile Rider Float, Age 3+ is sure to make a cool splash on hot summer days. Features a heavy duty handle to make staying on easy, even when slippery from pool water. Made from durable vinyl. Dimensions: 66 inch x 35 inch. Intended for children ages 3 and up.

  • Made with thick PVC material
  • Ideal for pool use

entry.title: Inflatables and Floats Bestway Inflatable Beach Ball
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wholesale Resort Accessories Dev
Type: Toys & Games
Price: 1.00

Bestway Inflatable Beach Ball

A classic beach toy, the Bestway Inflatable Beach ball is believed to have been invented by Jonathon DeLonge in 1938. The original beach balls are thought to have been about the size of a hand. Now the inflatable toys are sold in many different sizes, including unbelievably large or in the design of classic sport balls, soccer, volleyball, baseball and basket ball. See item #: 31004.

  • Inflates to 20"
  • Recommended for ages 2+
  • QTY-36

entry.title: Summer Play Water Gun - Stream Machine Hydro Zooka 12" Water Gun
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wholesale Resort Accessories Dev
Type: Toys & Games
Price: 5.00

Stream Machine Hydro Zooka 12" Water Gun

All day fun on land, in the pool or at the lake, the Stream Machine Hydro Zooka 12" Water Gun features a cool design and are made from high-impact tplastics. And, is easy to fill and operate and has a long range.  And, handles with a secure grip, and it will float on top of water.

You’ll have double the fun soaking your friends.  This easy to operate. Simply dip it into the water and pull back on the handle to siphon water up into the barrel. You’re ready to play.

  • 5 Years or older
  • Easy to Operate
  • Floats when dropped
  • Quick Dip Filling
  • Non-slip neoprene handle
  • Water Gun
  • Shoots far
  • Durable hard plastic
  • Assorted Colors
  • QTY-12
